isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 530 Engine Diagnostic Manual for 4000 Series Trucks (2001) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - TOOLS - BEYERS MODEL 200 PRESSURE TEST KIT (ZTSE2239)

svcsubproc.title: Description
svcsubproc.para: The Pressure Test Kit can be used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure, fuel pressure, air cleaner intake restriction, fuel restriction, exhaust restriction and crankcase pressure. It may also be used to test the accuracy of the gauges within the kit.
The 0-30 psi gauge may be used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure.
The 0-30 in Hg vacuum gauge (0-14.7 psi), is used to measure fuel system inlet restriction.
The 0-60 in of H 2O (magnehelic) gauge (0-2.16 psi), may be used to measure air cleaner restriction or crankcase pressure.

caution.para: The quick disconnects have shut off valves in the panel connectors not in the plug. DO NOT connect or disconnect lines while under pressure.

note.para: When using the magnehelic gauge, be sure to plug the test line into the proper (Pressure or Vacuum) port. Use the pressure port to read exhaust back pressure and crankcase pressure. Use vacuum port to read air cleaner restriction. In both cases, THE OPPOSITE CONNECTOR MUST BE VENTED TO THE ATMOSPHERE BY INSTALLING A QUICK CONNECT PLUG IN THE PORT.

svcsubproc.para: The 0-160 psi gauge may be used to check fuel pressure.
The 0-300 psi gauge is not normally used for any engine diagnostic checks on International® engines.

svcsubproc.title: Operating Instructions
svcsubproc.para: Connect tubes between the test ports on the panel and the test points shown on the (REAR SIDE) of HARD START / NO START AND PERFORMANCE DIAGNOSTIC FORM EGED-220.
